doc.after: Arkham Asylum is set in the fictional Arkham Asylum, a facility on Arkham Island off the coast of Gotham City that houses criminally insane supervillains.[7][22] The game features a large ensemble of characters from the history of Batman comics. Three voice actors, who worked on the DC Animated Universe series of film and television, reprised their roles for the game. Kevin Conroy voices Batmanâa superhero trained to the peak of human physical perfection and an expert in martial arts,[23][24][25] Mark Hamill voices Batman's psychopathic nemesis the Joker,[23] and the Joker's sidekick Harley Quinn is voiced by Arleen Sorkin.[26][27] Batman is aided by his allies Oracle (Kimberly Brooks)âwho remotely provides him with intelligence, and police commissioner James Gordon (Tom Kane).[28]
